mapper.select: select g.name,g.id groupid,a.* from t_amazon_group g left join t_amazon_auth t on g.id=t.groupid and t.shop_id=g.shopid left join t_amz_fin_account a on t.id=a.amazonAuthid where ifnull(a.processing_status,'Open')='Open' and t.`disable`=0 and g.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT a.groupid,t.currency,SUM(total_amount) amount,'convert' type from t_amz_settlement_acc_report t LEFT JOIN t_amazon_auth a ON a.id=t.amazonauthid WHERE a.shop_id = #{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.`disable`=0 and ((t.settlement_start_date >=#{beginDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.settlement_start_date <#{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR} ) or (t.settlement_end_date >=#{beginDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.settlement_end_date <#{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) OR (t.settlement_start_date <=#{beginDate,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.settlement_end_date >=#{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) ) GROUP BY a.groupid,t.currency UNION all SELECT a.groupid, f.currency,sum(original_total) amount,'untransfer' type from t_amz_fin_account f left join t_amazon_auth a on a.id=f.amazonAuthid where a.shop_id= #{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and a.`disable`=0 AND f.processing_status='Open' group by a.groupid,f.currency
